summary.para: Describes the elements in a buffer resource to use in a shader-resource view.

remarks.para: This structure is used by to create a view of a buffer.

summary.para: The index of the first element to be accessed by the view.
The number of elements in the resource.
The size of each element in the buffer structure (in bytes) when the buffer represents a structured buffer.
A -typed value that identifies view options for the buffer. Currently, the only option is to identify a raw view of the buffer. For more info about raw viewing of buffers, see Raw Views of Buffers.
